function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Encouraging individual responsibility for personal actions can create a false sense of security and lead to complacency in following public health guidelines.","Impact":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases, higher infection rates, and strain on healthcare systems.","Mitigation":"Continuously educate individuals about the ongoing risk of contagious diseases and the importance of following public health guidelines.","Technologies":"Public health communication strategies, digital platforms for information dissemination.","People":"General public","Owner":"Health organizations, public health agencies, government bodies"},{"Description":"Reliance on individual responsibility may lead to a lack of oversight and regulation in ensuring safety and hygiene standards in public transport and shared mobility.","Impact":"Risk of contamination and spread of contagious diseases in public transport and shared mobility.","Mitigation":"Implement stricter regulations and standards for safety and hygiene in public transport, conduct regular inspections and audits.","Technologies":"Sensor-based monitoring systems, contactless payment systems, sanitation technology for public transport.","People":"Public transport users, commuters","Owner":"Transport authorities, government regulators, public transport operators"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of social equity and accessibility in responsible transport policies may exacerbate health disparities and increase the risk of contagious diseases in marginalized communities.","Impact":"Higher infection rates and disproportionate impact of contagious diseases on marginalized communities.","Mitigation":"Incorporate social equity assessments into transport policies, prioritize accessibility and affordable transport options for marginalized communities.","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying disparities, digital platforms for community engagement and feedback.","People":"Marginalized communities, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Policy makers, community organizations, government agencies"}]}
